item.title: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North
item.description: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North. Turn right on CO-71 north for Kimball (Nebraska). Continue west on CO-14 for Ault.

item.title: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-14/CO-71 Split
item.description: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-14/CO-71 Split in Weld County. Turn right to continue north on CO-71.

item.title: I-76 East - Exit 92
item.description: I-76 east approaching Exit 92. Use Exit 92 for CO-71 South to Limon.

item.title: I-76 East - Exit 92
item.description: I-76 east approaching Exit 92 - BL-76/US-6/To US-34/To CO-71/Akron/Yuma. US-6 east leaves I-76 eastbound at Exit 92.

item.title: I-76 East - Exit 90
item.description: I-76 east approaching CO-71/Brush/Snyder.

item.title: I-76 East - US-34 East and CO-71 South Traffic - Use Exit 92
item.description: I-76 East - US-34 East to Wray and CO-71 South to Limon Traffic - Use Exit 92.

item.title: CO-71 North at US-24/US-40/US-287
item.description: CO-71 North at US-24/US-40/US-287 in Limon. Turn right to continue north on CO-71.

item.title: CO-71 North at US-24/US-40/US-287
item.description: CO-71 North at US-24/US-40/US-287 in Limon. Turn right for Burlington (via I-70); turn left for Denver (via I-70).

item.title: CO-71 North Approaching US-24/US-40/US-287
item.description: CO-71 North Approaching US-24/US-40/US-287 in Limon.

item.title: CO-71 North - Limon
item.description: Entering Limon on CO-71 north. Limon is the county seat of Lincoln County.

item.title: CO-71 North at CO-94
item.description: CO-71 North at CO-94 in Punkin Center. Turn right for CO-94 east to Kit Carson; left for CO-94 west to Limon. Continue straight on CO-71 north for Limon.

item.title: CO-71 North - Punkin Center
item.description: Entering Punkin Center on CO-71 north. Punkin Center is the small community at the junction of CO-71 and CO-94 in Lincoln County.

item.title: CO-71 North Approaching CO-94
item.description: CO-71 North Approaching CO-94 at Punkin Center.

item.title: CO-71 North - Snowplow Hours
item.description: No Snowplowing on CO-71 north of Ordway between the hours of 7 PM and 5 AM.

item.title: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 Split
item.description: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 split. Turn right to continue east on CO-96.

item.title: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 Junction
item.description: CO-71 North/CO-96 East at CO-71/CO-96 junction. Turn right on CO-96 East for Eads; continue north on CO-71 to Limon.

item.title: CO-96 East at CO-71
item.description: CO-96 East at CO-71 in Ordway. CO-96 East joins CO-71 North through Ordway. Turn right for CO-71 south to Rocky Ford. Turn left for CO-71 North/CO-96 East to Limon (via CO-71) and Eads (via CO-96).

item.title: CO-96 East Approaching CO-71
item.description: CO-96 East approaching CO-71 in Ordway.

item.title: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North
item.description: CO-14 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North. Turn right on CO-71 north for Kimball (Nebraska). Continue west on CO-14 for Ault.

item.title: CO-71 North at CO-14
item.description: CO-71 north at CO-14. Use CO-14 east for Sterling; CO-14 west/CO-71 north for Stoneham and Ault. CO-71 north joins CO-14 to Stoneham.

item.title: US-34 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North
item.description: US-34 West/CO-71 North at CO-71 North to I-76.

item.title: CO-71 North at US-34
item.description: CO-71 North at US-34. Turn right on US-34 for I-76 east. Turn left for CO-71 North/US-34 West.

item.title: CO-71 North Approaching US-34
item.description: CO-71 north approaching US-34. Turn right for US-34 to Sterling and Wray; left for US-34 West/CO-71 North to Brush. CO-71 joins US-34 west through Brush.

item.title: CO-71 North Approaching US-36
item.description: CO-71 north approaching US-36. Turn left for US-36 west to Denver; right on US-36 east to Anton. Continue north on CO-71 for Brush.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 361
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 361 - To CO-71/Limon.

item.title: BL-70/US-24/US-40 West/US-287 North/CO-71 South at CO-71 South
item.description: BL-70/US-24/US-40 West/US-287 North/CO-71 South at CO-71 South in Limon.

item.title: BL-70/US-24/US-40 West/US-287 North at CO-71
item.description: BL-70/US-24/US-40 West/US-287 North at CO-71. CO-71 joins BL-70/US-24/US-40 West/US-287 North through Limon.

item.title: BL-70/US-24/US-40 West/US-287 North/To CO-71
item.description: BL-70/US-24/US-40 West/US-287 North/To CO-71 approaching Limon, Colorado.

item.title: End CO-52 North at CO-14 To CO-71
item.description: CO-52 north at CO-14 west to New Raymer, CO-14 East/To CO-71 east to Sterling.

item.title: CO-71 South at CO-14
item.description: CO-71 south at CO-14. CO-14 west to Ault and Fort Collins; CO-14 East/CO-71 South to Sterling and Brush.

item.title: CO-71 South
item.description: CO-71 south in Weld County.

item.title: End CO-71 North - CO/NE Line
item.description: End CO-71 north at the Nebraska-Colorado Border.

item.title: CO-71 South - Weld County
item.description: Entering Weld County at the Colorado-Nebraska State Line on CO-71 south.

item.title: CO-71 South - Welcome To Colorado
item.description: Welcome to Colorado on CO-71 South at the Nebraska-Colorado border.

item.title: BL-70/US-24/US-287/US-40 To CO-71
item.description: BL-70/US-24/US-287/US-40/CO-71 in downtown Limon, CO

item.title: I-70 West Exit 363 Offramp
item.description: I-70 at BL-70/US-24/US-40/US-287/CO-71 Junction in Limon, CO
